description:
Susanna Hopkins is one of Oono`s friends from her time in America. She took a liking to Genshiken when she came to visit Japan, and now she`s finally studying abroad and joining as a member. Her nickname is Sue or Susie. She loves Japanese anime and manga, and often shouts lines from them. She`s taken a liking to Ogiue ever since seeing her doujinshi.
Source: ANN
name: Susanna Hopkins
